Articles.Content:
This task is to build an under-water base on any planet that has water/liquid oceans.

This is possible as I have done it in career mode.

STOCK PARTS AND CAMERA PARTS ONLY. You are allowed to use any camera mod as the depths are a bit fiddly when it comes to camera angle.

Points are achieved by completing tasks.

Achievements

Basic- Build a base and put it 50M underwater. 125 points.

Advanced- Build a base and put it 250M underwater. 250 points.

Hard- -Build a base and put it 500M underwater. 500 points.

Super Hard- Build a base and put it 1000M underwater. 1000 points.

Researcher- Put every Science equipment on it. 200 points.

Household- Make it store at least 10 Kerbals. 50 points (5 more points per extra Kerbal).

Resupply- Make a tether which leads from the base to the surface. 200 points (600 points if it is 1km Long).

Escape Route- Make a Ladder system which leads to the surface. 100 points (300 points if it is 1km long).

Navigation- Make the base be able to move underwater. 400 points (500 points on Eve).

Pioneer- Make it on Kerbin. 125 points.

Explorer- Make it on Eve. 250 points.

Founder- Make it on Laythe. 500 points.

Champions

I shall give you a hint: Asteroids.
